About The Web

Hi and welcome to my little corner of the internet ^^.. Get comfy, because I'll be regularly updating and sharing my projects and adventures.

Here, I document my journey in Landscape Architecture, Graphic Design, IT projects, and whatever else tickles my fancy ^^. I'm a creative soul who loves keeping my brain buzzing with new ideas. I enjoy human-centered design, respecting the relationships between humans, nature, and spaces.

Stay tuned, and let's enjoy this wild ride together ^^
